bug.short_desc: missing translation in other languages then einglish
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: In Transmission-remote-gtk is only enlish translation available, but i know that there many more translations e. g. italy, german, ec. has been provided by the developer.
Look here: https://sourceforge.net/p/transgui/tickets/385/
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):5.0.1
How reproducible:everytime
Steps to Reproduce: 1.install Transmission-remote-gtk 2.run it an do to the programsettings
Actual results: only english language is available
Expected results: many more languages shuld be available
Additional info:

> Look here: https://sourceforge.net/p/transgui/tickets/385/
That is a completely different project than this package.
Anyway the latest release was just packaged, can you verify this is still an issue: http://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/buildinfo?buildID=791204

the new package transmission-remote-gtk-1.3.1-1.fc24 solves the problem.
But i´ ve seen that the package transgui has been outdated, in the f24 repos only the version 5.01 avaible today the version 5.4.0 is up to date. shuld i make a nother Bug for it?
transmission-remote-gtk-1.3.1-1.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-b88d4fa981

(In reply to Matthias31 from comment #2) > the new package transmission-remote-gtk-1.3.1-1.fc24 solves the problem. > > But i´ ve seen that the package transgui has been outdated, in the f24 repos > only the version 5.01 avaible today the version 5.4.0 is up to date. shuld i > make a nother Bug for it?
Thanks for testing. Yes open another issue against the correct package as that is not this one.

thanks for help.
the Bug about transgui ist still open at: https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1366742

transmission-remote-gtk-1.3.1-1.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-b88d4fa981
transmission-remote-gtk-1.3.1-1.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
